name: Cursor Dodger Beta
description:
WARNING!

THIS GAME REQUIRES NW.JS APPLICATION SUPPORT OR ELSE IT WILL CRASH/WONT WORK
DOWNLOAD IT HERE

ChangeLog :

- 2021/18/08 (5 PM GMT)

  • Added new File: Linux (64 bits only) and Mac (32%64 Bits)
  • Fixed a bug where you get 32 mins after 60 seconds, then it goes by 61, 62 etc.
  • Added a new secret code... try find it :>
  • Fixed a bug where it says (Error: Non-Ascii Character in FixedAsciiString)

- 2021/18/08 (7 PM GMT)

  • Added a HTML Version of the game (if you want to  save some space)
  • Added a new Start Menu
  • Improved GUI System

In the Next Update:

  • New Enemies
  • New LateGame System
  • Pausing system

This game is created by an Engine Called Turbo Warp, its a copy of Scratch, but you can actually use it to make your own games "Executable"

Cursor Dodger Beta is a game where you have to dodge, you guessed it, BALLS.

This Game Can be played Endlessly.

If the Game got bugged, Press the Green Flag, if it still didnt fix, send me via Discord (KarlosGamer#4946)

Controls: 

  • E (Open Shop 1)
  • X (Open Shop 2)
  • A (Open Gold Shop)
  • Z (Heal)

Promo Codes will be shown on new events, or Celebrations Milestones

You can start creating your own games on 

TurboWarp: https://turbowarp.org/editor?interpolate
Exe. File Converter By TurboWarp: https://packager.turbowarp.org/

Submit your leaderboard by sending me a screenshot on discord (KarlosGamer#4946)
